displayProperties.description: The prison ship of the exiled Cabal Emperor Calus has returned. But its reappearance heralds the beginning of the end as the once-dormant lunar Pyramid stirs to life once more. With the aid of Eris Morn's witchcraft, the Guardian must work with Empress Caiatl, Commander Zavala, and Crow to unravel the mysteries of the Leviathan and the lunar Pyramid and stop Calus before it is too late.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Haunted

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Sidearm. Also get XP boosts that speed up Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: …in circles. Ancient enemies return to plague old battlegrounds. Time moves…
displayProperties.name: Season of the Undying

displayProperties.description: Re-entwine the strands of time on Mercury and ignite the flames of hope.
displayProperties.name: Season of Dawn

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Roam the Tangled Shore, avenge the fall of a legend, and walk the right side of wrong in Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Outlaw

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Rediscover the glories of the past and acquire beautiful new instruments of destruction.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Forge

displayProperties.description: The Almighty bears down on the Last City. Join forces with unlikely allies to avert this crisis and destroy the last vestige of Cabal power in the system.
displayProperties.name: Season of Arrivals

displayProperties.description: With the Almighty bearing down on the Last City, Guardians from all walks of life unite to bring all their power to bear against the Cabal sun-killer and forge new bonds with old rivals.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Worthy

displayProperties.description: Battle Empress Caiatl's forces and prove your strength against the champions of the Cabal.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Chosen

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Seasonal armor set and the new Solar Bow, Ticuu's Divination. You also get an XP boost that speeds up your Seasonal ranks and engram unlocks.

displayProperties.description: As the Pyramids send the system into chaos, Guardians must work with unexpected allies to hunt the monstrous forces of Xivu Arath and unravel the Hive god's network of mysterious cryptoliths.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Hunt

displayProperties.description: Savathûn has been brought out of hiding, revealing a harrowing discovery that shakes the Vanguard. As Xivu Arath prepares to capture her sister, Savathûn offers you a bargain: free her from her worm, and she will reveal the truth about the Darkness.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Lost

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Linear Fusion Rifle. Also get XP boosts that speed up Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: As the Last City is consumed by an Endless Night, Guardians must hack their way through the Vex Network with help from Mithrax, the Sacred Splicer.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Splicer

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Stasis Sidearm. You also get XP boosts that speed up your Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: The prison ship of the exiled Cabal Emperor Calus has returned. But its reappearance heralds the beginning of the end as the once-dormant lunar Pyramid stirs to life once more. With the aid of Eris Morn's witchcraft, the Guardian must work with Empress Caiatl, Commander Zavala, and Crow to unravel the mysteries of the Leviathan and the lunar Pyramid and stop Calus before it is too late.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Haunted

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Sidearm. Also get XP boosts that speed up Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Risen

preview.description: Get the Season Pass and instantly unlock the new Exotic Machine Gun. Also get XP boosts that speed up Seasonal ranks and reward track unlocks.

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: When Savathûn's Lucent Hive threaten the source of the Guardians' power, survival depends on the fragile alliance between the Vanguard and Empress Caiatl. Wielding a spear imbued with Light-suppressing technology, the Guardian must work with Lord Saladin and Caiatl's most trusted Psion to search for secrets in the minds of the Lucent Hive and stop their ghoulish plans.
displayProperties.name: Season of [Redacted]

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Choose what kind of Guardian you will become. Reckon with the path that lies ahead.
displayProperties.name: Season of the Drifter

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Venture into the Infinite Forest, uncover the mysteries of Osiris, and seek new challenges on Mercury.
displayProperties.name: Curse of Osiris

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Search for relics of the past, learn the secrets of Rasputin, and unearth things long forgotten beneath the frozen surface of Mars.
displayProperties.name: Resurgence

displayProperties.description: A new season has begun! Lavish yourself in gifts from the mighty Emperor Calus. Seek lost treasures throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Season of Opulence

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow I and defeat Scorn Chieftains.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound I

displayProperties.description: Successfully complete tiers of the Nightmare Containment public event on the Derelict Leviathan throughout the Season.
displayProperties.name: Nightmare Containment I

displayProperties.description: Throughout Season of the Haunted, collect Vestiges of Dread and pick up material nodes on the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Vestiges of Dread I

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Auto Rifle or Trace Rifle final blows on the Derelict Leviathan, and defeat combatants with Solar damage in any Sever activity.
displayProperties.name: Sustained Fire

displayProperties.description: On the Derelict Leviathan, complete bounties and earn progress by completing patrols and public events.
displayProperties.name: Derelict Leviathan Activities

displayProperties.description: Complete weekly playlist challenges.
displayProperties.name: Taking All Challenges

displayProperties.description: Calibrate mid-range weapons—Hand Cannons, Glaives, Auto Rifles, Fusion Rifles, and Machine Guns—on the Derelict Leviathan. Bonus progress for rapidly defeating combatants.
displayProperties.name: Mid-Range Calibration

displayProperties.description: Complete Gambit matches. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Dredgin' Up Victory

displayProperties.description: Defeat Guardians in Momentum Control. Earn bonus progress with Zone Advantage.
displayProperties.name: Momentum Crash

displayProperties.description: Defeat Scorn combatants in Vanguard playlists or on the Derelict Leviathan. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.
displayProperties.name: Scorn Pest Control

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow II and defeat Cabal with precision final blows.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound II

displayProperties.description: Open world chests while exploring the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Leviathan Chests

displayProperties.description: Focus equipment at the Crown of Sorrow throughout the Season.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Focusing I

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Scythe final blows on the Derelict Leviathan, and defeat combatants with Solar Power weapon final blows in Sever activities.
displayProperties.name: Harvest at Dawn

displayProperties.description: On the Moon, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Moon Activities

displayProperties.description: Complete a Lost Sector on Legend or higher.
displayProperties.name: Lost in the Legend

displayProperties.description: Calibrate close-range weapons—Sidearms, Submachine Guns, Shotguns, Glaives, and Swords—on the Moon. Bonus progress for rapidly defeating combatants.
displayProperties.name: Close-Range Calibration

displayProperties.description: Earn points by banking Motes, defeating Blockers, and defeating Guardians in Gambit.
displayProperties.name: Bank, Kill, Repeat

displayProperties.description: Complete Iron Banner matches. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Iron Sharpens Iron

displayProperties.description: Defeat Cabal combatants in Vanguard playlists or strikes. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.
displayProperties.name: Anti-Cabal Sweep

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow III and defeat Scorn with precision final blows.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound III

displayProperties.description: Successfully complete tiers of the Nightmare Containment public event on the Derelict Leviathan throughout the Season.
displayProperties.name: Nightmare Containment II

displayProperties.description: Throughout Season of the Haunted, bind Nightmares after completing Tier III of the Nightmare Containment and open Opulent Chests on the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Binding I

displayProperties.description: On the Derelict Leviathan, defeat combatants with Shotgun or Fusion Rifle final blows and defeat powerful Nightmares.
displayProperties.name: Loadout II

displayProperties.description: In the Throne World, complete bounties and earn progress by completing patrols, public events, and looting Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Throne World Activities

displayProperties.description: Reach Power Level {var:4112892655} by earning powerful rewards and Prime Engrams.
displayProperties.name: Power Broker

displayProperties.description: Calibrate long-range weapons—Pulse Rifles, Bows, and Trace Rifles—in the Throne World. Bonus progress in Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Long-Range Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat Taken in Gambit. Earn bonus progress for defeating tougher combatants.
displayProperties.name: Primeval Entourage

displayProperties.description: Defeat Guardians in Team Scorched. Charged detonations in midair or on surfaces earn bonus progress.
displayProperties.name: Scorched Earth

displayProperties.description: Defeat Champions in any Nightfall strike on Hero difficulty or higher. Earn bonus progress at higher difficulty tiers.
displayProperties.name: Ultimate Champion

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow IV and defeat Cabal Centurions throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound IV

displayProperties.description: On the Derelict Leviathan, defeat combatants with melee abilities. Solar melee abilities or Nightmares defeated with melee abilities grant additional progress.
displayProperties.name: Crematory Fist

displayProperties.description: Complete "Sever - Shame" using only a Solar subclass and Solar, Kinetic, or Stasis weapons.
displayProperties.name: Burning Shame

displayProperties.description: Extract weapon elements from a Haunted weapon with a Deepsight mod.
displayProperties.name: Shape of Nightmares I

displayProperties.description: Unlock artifact mods.
displayProperties.name: Mod Collector

displayProperties.description: Calibrate marksman weapons—Scout Rifles, Sniper Rifles, and Linear Fusion Rifles—by landing precision final blows. Bonus progress against Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Precision Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat powerful combatants in Gambit. Earn bonus progress for defeating high-value targets.
displayProperties.name: High-Value Hunter

displayProperties.description: Defeat Guardians in the Mayhem playlist with Super abilities.
displayProperties.name: Flourish of Power

displayProperties.description: Complete any Nightfall strike on Hero difficulty or higher.
displayProperties.name: Darkest Nightfall

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow V and defeat Nightmares on the Moon.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound V

displayProperties.description: Successfully complete tiers of the Nightmare Containment public event on the Derelict Leviathan throughout the Season.
displayProperties.name: Nightmare Containment III

displayProperties.description: Complete "Sever - Grief" using only a Void subclass and Void, Kinetic, or Stasis weapons.
displayProperties.name: Empty Grief

displayProperties.description: Focus equipment at the Crown of Sorrow throughout the Season.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Focusing II

displayProperties.description: Acquire Chain of Command.
displayProperties.name: Linking the Chain of Command

displayProperties.description: Defeat Guardians. Bonus progress is granted for opponents defeated with the help of Solar effects.
displayProperties.name: Sunburn

displayProperties.description: Defeat Cabal bosses in strikes or Vanguard playlists; defeat Nightmares anywhere in the system.
displayProperties.name: Leviathan Reaper - Cabal and Nightmare Bosses

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow VI and complete Lost Sectors throughout the system.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound VI

displayProperties.description: Complete "Sever - Rage" using only an Arc subclass and Arc, Kinetic, or Stasis weapons.
displayProperties.name: Sparking Rage

displayProperties.description: Throughout Season of the Haunted, collect Vestiges of Dread and pick up material nodes on the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Vestiges of Dread II

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Glaive or Sword final blows on the Derelict Leviathan and defeat powerful Cabal in any Sever activity.
displayProperties.name: Glean Cut

displayProperties.description: Masterwork a piece of armor.
displayProperties.name: Apex Armorer

displayProperties.description: Stun Champions.
displayProperties.name: Absolutely Stunning

displayProperties.description: Acquire the Crucible ornament for Chain of Command.
displayProperties.name: Crucible Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete Bound in Sorrow VII and defeat Champions within the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Sorrow Bound VII

displayProperties.description: Complete "Sever - Reconciliation" using only a Void subclass and Void, Kinetic, or Stasis weapons.
displayProperties.name: Nullifying Reconciliation

displayProperties.description: Throughout Season of the Haunted, bind Nightmares after completing Tier III of the Nightmare Containment and open Opulent Chests on the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Binding II

displayProperties.description: Shape any Haunted weapon.
displayProperties.name: Shape of Nightmares II

displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with Trace Rifles and Shotguns in Gambit. Bonus progress for defeated Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Beam Cannon

displayProperties.description: Complete Crucible matches in the Glory Rank playlist. Earn bonus progress for wins.
displayProperties.name: Fleeting Glory

displayProperties.description: Complete any Nightfall strike on Grandmaster.
displayProperties.name: Grandmaster

displayProperties.description: Complete "Sever - Forgiveness" using only an Arc subclass and Arc, Kinetic, or Stasis weapons.
displayProperties.name: Shocking Forgiveness

displayProperties.description: Throughout Season of the Haunted, collect Vestiges of Dread and pick up material nodes on the Derelict Leviathan.
displayProperties.name: Vestiges of Dread III

displayProperties.description: Focus equipment at the Crown of Sorrow throughout the Season.
displayProperties.name: Umbral Focusing III

displayProperties.description: Reach Power Level {var:1131227462} by earning pinnacle rewards.
displayProperties.name: Pinnacle

displayProperties.description: Calibrate Trace Rifles and Shotguns. Bonus progress for rapidly defeating targets and defeating Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Widepoint Calibration

displayProperties.description: Acquire the Gambit ornament for Chain of Command.
displayProperties.name: Gambit Ornament

displayProperties.description: Complete "Sever - Resolve" using only a Solar subclass and Solar, Kinetic, or Stasis weapons.
displayProperties.name: Warm Resolve

displayProperties.description: On the Derelict Leviathan, defeat combatants with Rocket Launcher final blows and rapidly defeat combatants in groups of 3 or more.
displayProperties.name: Cabal Tactics

displayProperties.description: Calibrate Kinetic, Energy, and Power weapons. Bonus progress against Champions.
displayProperties.name: Armory-Wide Calibration

displayProperties.description: Defeat targets with Solar effects. Bonus progress for defeating Guardians.
displayProperties.name: Solar Gambit

displayProperties.description: Win multiple rounds in the Trials of Osiris.
displayProperties.name: Trial by Firing Squad

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Solar effects in Vanguard playlists.
displayProperties.name: Solar Vanguard

displayProperties.description: Defeat combatants with Machine Gun final blows on the Derelict Leviathan, and defeat powerful Scorn in any Sever activity.
displayProperties.name: Haunting Cacophony

displayProperties.description: On Europa, earn progress by completing bounties, patrols, public events, and Lost Sectors.
displayProperties.name: Europa Activities

displayProperties.description: Acquire the Vanguard ornament for Chain of Command.
displayProperties.name: Vanguard Ornament

seasonalChallenges.name: Seasonal Challenges
seasonalChallenges.description: Complete limited-time challenges for Season rank, Bright Dust, and other rewards.
